author: gdaniels
msg: Don't send xsi:types/multirefs for wrapped services.
This brought to light a problem in Call where the returnType wasn't getting
propagated to the Operation if it was set before other parameters were
added.  We now ALWAYS have an OperationDesc available in the Call.
Also set a couple of options which might be useful later (when cleaning
up the option-getting code in SerializationContextImpl) in WSDDService.

author: butek
msg: FaultException is really old.  No one should have been using it for months,

author: butek
msg: getLinkedCause.  I've kept the old stuff around and deprecated it.

author: gdaniels
msg: Fix xmlToJavaName() to correctly deal with cases where punctuation (i.e.
"_") starts an identifier that has multiple capital letters.  "_OID" should map
Add a unit test for this.
